author: boston.com
title: Shake the flu off with Beth Israel’s new Taylor Swift parody video - Massachusetts news
text:
Related Links This Boston artist made a portrait of Taylor Swift using 17,000 gum balls Get today’s headlines right in your inbox Beth Israel Deaconess Medical Center’s Flu Fighters team has added to the litany of “Shake It Off” parodies with their flu prevention video.
 The nurses, doctors, and staff all sung flu-related lyrics to the tune of T-Swizzle’s hit, the video shows them dancing around the building to spread the message about flu season.
The four minute video focuses on hygiene, getting vaccinated, using sanitizer, and encouraging you to wash your hands regularly—and then shake them off, shake them off.
Video not working? Click here to watch on YouTube .
